job_tasks.phrase: understand customer business needs and translate them into end-to-end technical solutions
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly describes the ability to grasp business requirements and convert them into actionable technical plans.

job_tasks.phrase: deploy production ready pipelines and ML models on the Cloud
job_tasks.justification: This refers to the operational aspects of getting models and pipelines ready for production environments, which is a core part of MLOps.

job_tasks.phrase: deploy production ready pipelines and ML models
job_tasks.justification: The mention of 'ML models' and their deployment indicates involvement in the modeling lifecycle.
Pipelines are a key component of data engineering, especially when referring to production-ready systems.

job_tasks.phrase: adoption of cutting edge tools and frameworks
job_tasks.justification: This implies evaluating and potentially implementing new modeling techniques or tools.

job_tasks.phrase: high-quality delivery of your team's projects
job_tasks.justification: This speaks to the overall software development lifecycle and ensuring project success.

job_tasks.phrase: help sales qualify and land exciting projects
job_tasks.justification: This demonstrates an understanding of business development and sales processes related to technical solutions.

soft_skills.phrase: help sales qualify and land exciting projects
drive internal evaluation and adoption of cutting edge tools and frameworks
high-quality delivery of your team's projects

classification.rationale: The job description emphasizes deploying production-ready ML pipelines and models on the cloud, along with exploring ML research and guiding junior engineers. While there's business understanding, the core focus remains on the technical implementation and operationalization of ML systems.
